markdown.markdown:
I am an independent public health consultant with more than 20 years of professional experience in community and public health in humanitarian crises and developing country-settings, including as a community health worker, medical doctor, and most recently as the Head of Valid Measures, the specialised metrics, analytics and technology unit of [Valid International](https://www.validinternational.org). I have expertise in spatial epidemiology, geo-statistics, cartography and statistical programming. In my role as head of Valid Measures, I led the design, development and implementation of innovative surveys and assessments on health and nutrition and bespoke analytical approaches that leverage the advantages of Bayesian statistics and resampling techniques. I am a founding member of [Katilingban](https://katilingban.io/), a collective of public health and nutrition experts and practitioners. I am currently a [consulting research data scientist](https://www.ecohealthalliance.org/personnel/dr-ernest-guevarra) for [EcoHealth Alliance](https://www.ecohealthalliance.org/) to support its computational analytics work in support of pandemic preparedness and One Health research and a Senior Research and Teaching Associate at the [Centre for Tropical Medicine and Global Health](https://www.tropicalmedicine.ox.ac.uk/), [Nuffield Department of Medicine](https://www.ndm.ox.ac.uk/), [University of Oxford](https://www.ox.ac.uk/).


**Harvard School of Public Health, Harvard University** | Boston, MA    
Master of Public Health International Health Concentration | Sept 2004 - June 2005

**Harvard School of Public Health, Harvard University** | Boston, MA    
Certificate in Humanitarian Studies | Sept 2004 - June 2005

**University of the Philippines College of Medicine** | Manila, Philippines    
Doctor of Medicine | June 1994 - June 2001

**University of the Philippines College of Medicine** | Manila, Philippines    
Bachelor of Science in Basic Medical Sciences | June 1994 - June 1998

## Experience

**[Centre for Tropical Medicine and Global Health](https://www.tropicalmedicine.ox.ac.uk/), [Nuffield Department of Medicine](https://www.ndm.ox.ac.uk/), [University of Oxford](https://www.ox.ac.uk/)**    
Senior Research and Teaching Associate | October 2023 - present

[EcoHealth Alliance](https://www.ecohealthalliance.org)    
Consulting Research Data Scientist | December 2020 - present

[Katilingban](https://katilingban.io)    
Founing Member | July 2020 - present

[Centre for Tropical Medicine and Global Health](https://www.tropicalmedicine.ox.ac.uk/), [Nuffield Department of Medicine](https://www.ndm.ox.ac.uk/), [University of Oxford](https://www.ox.ac.uk/)    
Teaching Fellow | July 2020 - October 2023

[Valid International](https://www.validinternational.org)    
Head of Measures | January 2017 - March 2020

[Valid International](https://www.validinternational.org)    
Survey and Assessments Specialist | January 2015 - December 2016

[Valid International](https://www.validinternational.org)    
Technical Advisor | September 2009 - December 2014
